alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Kershaw; Richland; Southern Lancaster (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Fairfield, southwestern Lancaster, northern Richland and western Kershaw Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 500 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lake Wateree State Park, or near Springdale, moving east at 15 mph. ...Boaters on Lake Wateree Should Seek Safe Harbor... HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Camden, Winnsboro, Lake Wateree Dam, Kershaw, Lugoff, Westville, Longtown, Liberty Hill, Lake Wateree State Park, Ridgeway, Dekalb, North Towne Square Shopping Center, Mitford, Winnsboro Mills, Pine Grove Fire Station, Smallwood and Lake Wateree near Highway 97. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 92 and 96. Interstate 77 between mile markers 33 and 50. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
